RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 400 Y Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Claiming Purse 3500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PATTERNS OF INSANITY strengthening strides. LITE HEARTED slight bobble, up for place. PILOTO WARRIOR dueled, just missed place. HONKIN KK fired, caught late. ACTION MILAGRO bid, weakened.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Purse 10000. For Accredited La Bred Maidens, Fillies And Mares Three Years Old and Upward Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AVASIPPINGONCORONAS bumped, floated out, clear. MS BAR NONE T broke out, second best. POWER UP solid effort. SUPER BUXS broke inward. JET BLACK GAME lost traction start. EWP JUST KILLIN TIME second flight duel.

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Bar None T
ENTRY.OWNER: Hausman Cheryl and Hausman DVM Carey P

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 250 Y Dirt CR: 78. Optional Claiming Purse 11700. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DE TANYAS CARTEL late surge, in time. AJKISS THIS CORONA off best, nipped at wire. LADY GENEVIEVE early bump. JJ KICJESS PRINCESS bid, urged, empty. DDEEZ KISS MY DASH bump, no rally. LOOKIN FAST N FAMOUS hesitated break.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 350 Y Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Purse 10000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY CORONA BLUES long duel, won bob. BAR FIGHT BLUES broke out, bumped, dueled, outnodded. HIM GONE unable to match strides. TM COAL TRAIN pinched at break. JESSAGREATGRANDSON chased, mild menace. AJ IS BLUE never fully leveled. IM JUSTTHATGUY broke inward.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 220 Y Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Claiming Purse 3500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TESSIES GIFT fired on first step. QUICK OPEN BAR drifted in, outdueled. JJ BABY SWEET JESS clean trip, best of rest. LOUISIANA SASS in tight partway. RW KOOLMAN steady urge, empty. BERLYNETTA little factor.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: S G Flores & T C Bartlett

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 400 Y Dirt CR: 99. Allowance Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RDD EMPIRE BUILDER three-peat perfromance. BYE CORONA no match, clear second. JESS PERFECT MOON too little too late. JM FRIDAY chased, no menace. ONE SWEET MERLOT steadily faded.

ENTRY.NAME: One Sweet Merlot
ENTRY.OWNER: Jones David and Cowan Mark C

ENTRY.NAME: Jess Perfect Moon
ENTRY.OWNER: Hausman Cheryl and Hausman DVM Carey P

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 110 Y Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 4300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIAS MOLLY DOLLAR sharp, held. DADDY SWEET PRINCESS fired, just missed. JESS DRIVE DA TRAIN always close. SIZZLE ME A SKILLET never far from it. JJ CORONAS KING in mix every step. PERRY SPECIAL CHICK lacked late kick. DJR FAST JET lost footing at break.
